div.p: Our organization offers various accessories and appliances for men, women, and children and as an e-commerce website, we provide many offers to our customers. Our offers are segmented in various sections like for children, men, and women. Apart from that, we provide, home and garden offer, furniture and lighting offer, health and beauty offer, electrical offers, etc.

We also provide various products and items for decoration and improving the fashion or your garden, home or terrace. Except these, we offer a variety of items and products for lifestyle, sports and clothing which are filled with large and small appliances.

Behind starting the organization, our primary motto was to simplify and rejuvenate the day to day usage of the goods and commodities. Often people wonder about which products to use to keep all of their necessities and requirements in line. We wanted to come up with an easy and simple solution.

On the other hand, our vision was to retain all the commodities under one roof, so that people didn’t have to run for separate goods in separate stores. So we came up with an all in one solution. Along with that, with the rising price of commodities, we wanted to keep our company unique and under budget for all classes of people.
Some of our exclusive collection includes the accessories of art and metal, chocolate, pure crystal decoration, and many more.
Apart from these, we also offer a range of various products for men, women, and children. To have an idea about them, please visit our official website.

Our privacy policy particularly explains and mentions about the personal and professional data we gather from you once you interact with us or visit our profile for any requirement or support. Once you are associated with us, we will describe the process in detail how we restore, manage, and handle your data. Your data operation on our circuit is completely safe and secured.

Once we get in reach to your data, we understand that there is a lot of valuable information. That is why you are always completely informed and updated about your rights and formal procedures of your claims.

We generally run a credit checking procedure by combining the minute details of the data. However, the usage and utilization of your data from our side remain in your awareness. A particular image of yours is demonstrated in the domain which can be accessed by you and with your approval, it can be also shared amongst the necessary personalities.

Once your purchase from our website, we receive a copy of the information that you have supplied and that is usually utilized to personalize your data. We are also open to provide you with ameliorated marketing and digital communication with your agreement.

In certain cases, when you apply for products or services from any of our providers, your data is collected by them and utilized under their separate privacy policies. It is further to provide you an assurance that the data which are collected and processed from our end always remains under the law of data protection. Your freedom and interests are never compromised or shortened in accordance with our compliance. We utilize your preferences and priorities for providing you with the products and services by the mode of always keeping you informed.4
We always hope to work on our mutual interests and benefits.

The term and condition apply to the usage and utilization of our website. Accessing our website or placing an order on our website can be done with the given norms and regulations. For gaining access to our website you need to agree to be bound with the terms and conditions.

You can always ask any sort of questions or contact our customer services before placing an order on our website. You can kindly note that the inbound and outbound calls will be recorded for training purposes, qualified monitoring, and supervising.
The term and condition are valid for any product delivered and if it is delivered across the nation then international terms and conditions will be applicable.

Once you register with our website, the personal data which you will be providing for registration must be accurate, correct, true, and current and complete in all respects. If any of the personal data is altered, you are required to notify us by updating the new details on your online account.

You make a conscious agreement of indemnifying, defending, and holding us and our officers, employees, agents, suppliers harmless on demand instantly from and against all kinds of claims, liabilities, losses, costs, and expenses which is inclusive of reasonable legal fees. These can rise out of any breach of the conditions provided by you or any other liabilities who has a usage capacity of the website. It is also applicable to any other person accessing your website using your personal information or shopping details.

We have the authority to modify or withdraw temporarily or permanently the website with or without notice, where you confirm that the act will not be liable to the modification or withdrawal of the website from your side or any third party side.
We can change the conditions in a regular interval and those changes shall be deemed to your acceptance of the usage of the website.

You can easily return or exchange any unwanted or unsuited items, products, or services up to 40 days after purchasing the same. There are conditions that the item, product, or service must not be used and should remain in their original condition inclusive of all the tags and labels remaining in the correct position. In case of the electronic gadgets like phones, tablets, laptops there must not remain any sort of personal data or manufacturer registration. Lastly, the buyer should have proof of purchasing such as any kind of delivery note or receipt.

We only exchange or return a product or an item if it matches with our terms and conditions. Apart from that, for any online or telephone purchase, we refund the standard delivery charge once the complete order is returned within 14 days. The returned objects are checked by our specialists.

If any of the product or item develops a fault within 40 days of purchase, then we generally exchange or refund it given that there are no security features enabled and all the personal data are removed. Once the timeline crosses 4s0 days, then we repair or replace the product in accordance with our global terms and conditions which are valid for any country.

For the purchases held at in-store or online, you can return those to any of our shop outlets. In specific cases of online purchases, you can label, package, and easily drop off the unwanted or undesired items and products in the given locations by us. For large appliances, you are enabled to return through our home collection services. Certain charges are applicable in it.
For any exchange in our primary shops, the items or products must meet the return policies, or else you can also place a new order for the same product and return the unwanted one.
